description: List of all TSC members and information about them.

name.description: Full name of the person, a nice human-readable name

github.description: In must be a valid GitHub handle. It is used to provide a link to person's profile on GitHub and display profile picture on the AsyncAPI website

linkedin.description: Only LinkedIn profile name, everything you see after https://www.linkedin.com/in/ link. It is used on the AsyncAPI website to provide link to profile.

twitter.description: Twitter profile name. It is used on the AsyncAPI website to provide link to profile.

availableForHire.description: It is not mandatory property as by default it is set to false. Nevertheless please add it, even if 'false' for better clarity. We use it on the AsyncAPI website to visually indicate that given person is available for hire.

company.description: It must be clear if given TSC member is affiliated with some company. AsyncAPI's open governance model allows no more than 1/4 of TSC representatives from the same company. In case you are an individual contributor, you do not have to provide this property. In the UI we will mark you as individual contributor if this property is missing.

slack.description: It must be a valid slackID. It is the ID of the slack of the person 's profile

items.description: List of repositories names that must match the GitHub name of the repository. It is used to provide a link to the repository in AsyncAPI website
